babel-desc: Vyongereza igikorwa c'uwutunganya #babel kugirango hemerwe urunganwe rwa babeli rukoresha umurongo hamwe n'ubushobozi bwo kwongeramwo inyandikorugero.
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Abakoresha bo muri uno muce berekana ko bafise urugero rw'ubumenye rungana $1 mu rurimi $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Abakoresha muri uno muce berekana ubumenyi bwabo bw'ururimi $1.
babel-0: Uwu mukoresha afise ubumenyi [[$1|no]] mu [[$2|$3]] (canke arutegera bigoranye cane).
babel-4: Uwu mukoresha afise ubumenyi [[$1|bwegereje ururimi kavukire]] mu [[$2|$3]].
babel-0-n: Uwu mukoresha [[$1|ntagira]] ubumenyi mu [[$2|Kirundi]] (canke agitegera bigoranye).
babel-4-n: Uwu mukoresha afise ubumenyi [[$1|bwegereje ururimi kavukire]] mu [[$2|Kirundi]].
